paksha karyalayak wath nomathi mebandu namika paksha raskara gena ithihasaye dawanthama sandhanaya goda nangu bawa kima aithihasika wihiluwak wi athi bawath owuhu pawasathi.me peramunata assan karana mohothedi es.bi. disanayaka, sajith pe්ramadasa yana mahathwarun ema awasthawa warjanaya kala athara ejapaye bhandagarika dhuraya darana thanaththa me sambandhayen pawasa thibenne gothrawadi namika paksha rasak ekathu kara gena ejapaya thawa duratath hallu wi athi bawathya.eksath jathika peramunata ekathu wi sitina ejapaya athulu anekuth siyaluma paksha mathiwarana ithihasaye eka pita antha parajayan laba itha dubala thaththwayaka pasuwana athara anekuth pakshawalin 95% k pamana sabawinma kriyakari nowana athara ewani malagiya paksha samanga mewara ejapaya pihituwa gena thibenne mala sandhanayak bawath ejapaye ranil wirodhi parshwaya pawasayi.ejapaya kisiyam sandhanayak goda nanga gathahoth ehi mahalekam dhurayata thissa aththanayaka mahatha path karana bawa mulin pawasa thibuna da ohuta ema thanathura nodi weragoda mahatha path kirimata ranil wikramasinha mahatha gath piyawara sambandhayen barapathala dosharopana ella wemin pawathi.
